product_name: Black Diamond Cliff Cabana Double Portaledge
long_description: The world's strongest, most reliable single-point suspension sleeping system, the 2-person Cliff Cabana Double Portaledge makes for easy living when you and your partner are way off the deck.
short_description: The world's strongest, most reliable single-point suspension sleeping system, the 2-person Cliff Cabana Double Portaledge makes for easy living when you and your partner are way off the deck.
